name: Five Elders
text: Activate:Main If your Leader is [Imu], you may rest 1 of your DON!! cards and trash 1 card from your hand: Trash all of your Characters. Then, play up to 5 (Five Elders) type Characters with different card names and 5000 power from your trash.
